Articles.Content: Is it possible to keep spots locked until "discovered". Would it be possible to add in some off world sites? Im eyeing Waylands Eagle lanchpad for the moon...

Ok- Now we just need pictures of each of the launch locations (and map positions), so we can choose which one we want.

In other news: The Bill Cove Helipad needs to be a bit higher up- otherwise it is enveloped in the ground. (Two meters higher should do it)

Oh- and can we remove the WaylandCorp Towers from the next version? The Chalice Tower should be able to take it's place.

Ok, so I think I installed this correctly, but I am getting this bug.

I selected Jeb's Island retreat as the launch point, and this happened when I hit launch.

Any ideas? I am using 0.2 if that helps.

Ok, so I think I installed this correctly, but I am getting this bug.

http://i.imgur.com/LvOaenk.png

I selected Jeb's Island retreat as the launch point, and this happened when I hit launch.

http://i.imgur.com/ld8nFZb.png

Any ideas? I am using 0.2 if that helps.

Delete the files, then re-install. That fixed what is happening to you on my machine.
Quick question-does this work with kerbin city? Seems a waste to not use that as well

Quick question-does this work with kerbin city? Seems a waste to not use that as well

99% certain it does. I'll confirm this later today.

Ok, so I think I installed this correctly, but I am getting this bug.

I selected Jeb's Island retreat as the launch point, and this happened when I hit launch.

Any ideas? I am using 0.2 if that helps.

Mekan1k is spot on. Delete the mod dependencies, re-install them, then install 02. 01 is trash - just bin it.

Is it possible to keep spots locked until "discovered". Would it be possible to add in some off world sites? Im eyeing Waylands Eagle lanchpad for the moon...

Love the idea but that'd probably need some serious coding in KerbTown which is being maintained by another modder. Got a link to that launchpad? I'm always on the lookout for more parts/buildings.
Found this ol' part buried deep beneath the desert with it's helipad spawn in the wrong place and erm... fixed it a bit. If I can get permissions I'll put it in 0.3.
I believe that is HoneyFox's Ocean Odyssey. I had the issue of it being buried in a desert too.

If you want to continue adding more, this silo is fun to use:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/47065-0-21-ICBM-Launch-Silo

Quick question-does this work with kerbin city? Seems a waste to not use that as well

Finally got around to confirming that this does work with KerbinCity. Busy, busy day, sorry for the delay
The reason that honeyfox's ocean odyssey spawns in the desert is because it is meant for RSS

The reason that honeyfox's ocean odyssey spawns in the desert is because it is meant for RSS

I'm aware

HoneyFox has given permission for this to be included in Kerbin-Side v0.3.

Love the idea but that'd probably need some serious coding in KerbTown which is being maintained by another modder. Got a link to that launchpad? I'm always on the lookout for more parts/buildings.

Here you go. http://www.devogeninteractive.com/waylandmods/download/file.php?id=8
Can we get a map of the locations?

Can we get a map of the locations?

Working on it. Placing flags. Then SCANsat go!

Thing is, it'll be out-of-date immediately since I'm not done with new bases yet.
Map added to first post. Thank you SCANsat devs for your awesome mod.

Map added to first post. Thank you SCANsat devs for your awesome mod.

You're a peach. Thanks.
Can we have a launch site on the eastern continent? It's completely empty, and there's, like, four other bases just around KSC.

Can we have a launch site on the eastern continent? It's completely empty, and there's, like, four other bases just around KSC.

I've not finished adding bases yet, so yep.

Do you think you could find time to fix the http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/47065-0-21-ICBM-Launch-Silo ?

It's really fun to launch out of, but currently is a few meters off. Thanks!

By the way, I love the mod that you put together. It works great for me, and is really fun to use. Thanks!

Do you think you could find time to fix the http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/47065-0-21-ICBM-Launch-Silo ?

I did take a look at this but I'm wary of trying to 'fix' it as there's more to this particular part than just adding a working spawn point.
I am busy re-learning 3D modelling/texturing and hope to include some new buildings and facilities in future releases. Stuff like this:
I'll be keeping an eye on this. Great work!
